dualism is a joke, there are certain philosophers however (see sections of the "realist" school of thought, also somewhat of a joke), who choose to label anyone who disagrees with them a dualist, even if they make no claims about the mind inhabiting any kind of supernatural or nondeterminist world.

Dualism is a joke.
